step_data.thought: I've explored several main menu options (SYSTEM, STORES, CONTENT, REPORTS) but haven't found the Site Map link. In Magento Admin, the Site Map is typically found at the very bottom of the page in the footer area. Looking at the contentinfo section (footer) of the page more carefully, I can see links for 'Privacy Policy', 'Account Activity', and 'Report an Issue', but I don't see a direct 'Site Map' link. This suggests that the Site Map might not be directly accessible from a standard navigation menu or footer link.\n\nIn Magento, the Site Map is sometimes accessed via a direct URL pattern like '/sitemap' or it might be in a submenu I haven't fully explored yet. Let me check if there's a direct URL I can navigate to. Since I've exhausted the main navigation options, I'll try to directly navigate to the standard Magento sitemap URL.
